operations.description: Create patch file for getPointSize fix

operations.command: sed -i '577s/.*/        const btcText = `TX Point`;  \/\/ BUGFIX: No btc_amount available/' /media/sam/1TB/UTXOracle/live/frontend/mempool-viz.js

operations.description: Wait for page to fully reload and reconnect

operations.command: sed -i '298a\        console.log("[DEBUG updateData] Called with", transactions?.length || 0, "transactions, baseline:", baseline ? "yes" : "no");' live/frontend/mempool-viz.js
sed -i '315a\        console.log("[DEBUG updateData] After filter:", this.transactions.length, "transactions in window");' live/frontend/mempool-viz.js
sed -i '/drawPoints() {/a\        console.log("[DEBUG drawPoints] Called, transactions:", this.transactions.length);' live/frontend/mempool-viz.js

operations.description: Wait for page reload and WebSocket connection

operations.command: sed -i '/for (const tx of this.transactions) {/a\            if (Math.random() < 0.01) console.log("[DEBUG drawPoints] TX:", tx.timestamp, tx.price, "x:", this.scaleX(tx.timestamp), "y:", this.scaleY(tx.price));' live/frontend/mempool-viz.js
operations.description: Add sampling debug log in drawPoints loop

operations.command: sed -i '/if (x >= this.marginLeft && x <= this.marginLeft + this.plotWidth &&/a\                if (Math.random() < 0.01) console.log("[DEBUG drawPoints] Point IN BOUNDS, drawing at:", x, y, "size:", this.getPointSize(tx));' live/frontend/mempool-viz.js

sed -i '516d' live/frontend/mempool-viz.js && sed -i '517a\                if (Math.random() < 0.01) console.log("[DEBUG drawPoints] Point IN BOUNDS, drawing at:", x, y, "size:", this.getPointSize(tx));' live/frontend/mempool-viz.js
operations.description: Fix bounds check debug log placement
Create patch for price scaling fix
Wait for page load and WebSocket connection
